overview: Ido hates working at the local Falafel shop. He stays there because of his shift manager, Hadas, but he doesn't have the guts to tell her that he loves her. Will Sassi Keshet, a Game show host for the past 20 years, help him overcome his fears?

production_companies.name: Tel Aviv University Film & Television Department

tagline: Boy meets girl, meets falafel, meets Sassi Keshet.
title: Sassi Keshet Never Eats Falafel
